result.title: DP on Segment Trees Tutorial
result.content:
Hi everyone,

I'll talk about a well known trick, called dp on segment tree, which uses segment tree to optimize O(n2) solutions to O(nlogn).

I'll explain it on the LIS problem.

Problem Definition: Given an array of n integers, output the length of the longest increasing sub-sequence.

Naive Solution:

Complexity : O(n2)

Maintain an array, res[N], that maintains for each integer, the longest increasing sub-sequence that ends in that integer. Loop through the given array, get the answer for the number at the current index, which will be max(res[0], res[1], ..res[arr[ind] - 1]) + 1, and then update res[arr[ind]] with this value.

Optimized Solution: Just maintain the values of res in a segment tree.
